code: import React from'react';import apiClient from'../../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Expenses(){const[desc,setDesc]=React.useState('');const[amt,setAmt]=React.useState('');async function save(){if(!desc||!amt)return alert('fill');try{await apiClient.api('/api/expenses',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({description:desc,amount:Number(amt)}),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});setDesc('');setAmt('');alert('Saved');}catch(e){alert(e.message);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Record Expense"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Description",value:desc,onChange:e=>setDesc(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Amount",type:"number",value:amt,onChange:e=>setAmt(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:save,children:"Save"})]})});}
